EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-06-13-5.9 Release Webinar.EMAIL- Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Turbonomic 5.9 Is Here! Join us for a LIVE Customer Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/whats-new/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Today, Turbonomic announced <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/turbonomic-announces-5-9/]]> major advancements to our hybrid cloud management platform with Turbonomic 5.9, enabling customers to confidently accelerate their journey to hybrid cloud. Turbonomic 5.9 extends the platform’s on-premises capabilities with new support for Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Microsoft Azure public cloud environments, delivering:
- Visibility of all workloads, whether on-premises or in AWS and Azure environments - Acceleration of public cloud migration - Lowering of public cloud bills by 30% on average - Control of workloads to assure performance and deliver service levels - Enforcement of compliance policies across a hybrid cloud
On June 13, 2017 from 10:00 – 11:00 AM ET, join us for a live webinar, demo and Q&A about Turbonomic 5.9. Register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/whats-new/]]> to join the webinar, during which our Chief Technology Officer, Charles Crouchman, and Senior Product Manager, Mor Cohen-Tal, will provide an in-depth look and demo the platform’s new capabilities. Turbonomic 5.9 is generally available today. You can request your update to Turbonomic 5.9 here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1292-how-to-perform-an-operations-manager-offline-update-latest-links-included]]> on the Green Circle. We hope you can make it! Thank you, - Your Turbonomic Team
